ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode: def Load(widget): if widget.Entity == None: return objeto = widget.Entity.ObjetoInstance contratoEmElaboracao = objeto.ContratoEmElaboracao(objeto.ContratoHandle) widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = contratoEmElaboracao widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = contratoEmElaboracao widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = contratoEmElaboracao
